Class Building

java.lang.Object
lib.Building
Direct Known Subclasses:

public class Building extends Object
This class is used to represent a building

  • Method Details

    • getLength

      public int getLength()
      Returns the length of the building.
      Returns:
      The length of the building.

    • setLength

      public void setLength(int length)
      It sets the length of the building. If the building is instance of House or Office check if lower limit is 4 and upper limit is 40 If the building is instance of Market check if lower limit is 4 and upper limit is 80 If the building is instance of Playground check if lower limit is 4 and upper limit is 120
      Parameters:
      length - The length of the building.

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      Returns the height of the building
      Returns:
      The height of the building.

    • setHeight

      public void setHeight(int height)
      Set the height of the building. If height is not even then throw an exception due to scaling problem, height should be even. If the building is instance of House or Office check if lower limit is 4 and upper limit is 60 If the building is instance of Market check if lower limit is 4 and upper limit is 12 If the building is instance of Playground check if limit is 2
      Parameters:
      height - The height of the building.

    • getId

      protected String getId()
      Returns the id of building
      Returns:
      The id of the building.
